desc: After defeating Maxwell, the Summoner receives an urgent request from Akras Summoners' Hall. The Demon Algmos has been spotted and a squad has been sent to slay him, but Seria ignored orders and went to seek him out alone. The Hall wants you to bring her back safely.It seems Algmos's decimation of a squad Seria had led in the past started it all...
name: The Crimson God's Cry
